description: Try our easy to follow Summer Fruits Pudding recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Summer Fruits Pudding Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Turn out onto a serving plate, pour over any remaining fruit juice and decorate with a few redcurrant sprigs arranged on top of the pudding in the centre, if wished. Serve with whipped or pouring cream.
